unique_passive.description: When attacked by an enemy hero's skill, reduces their Physical ATK by 8% for 2s (up to 3 stacks).

Upon dealing damage to the target, reduces Shield and HP Regen of the target by 50% for 3s.
null
null

Can be triggered when taking Magic Damage. Reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 5s (including the Magic Damage that triggers this effect). You will be able to trigger this effect again only after leaving combat for 10s.
Generating a critical attack will increase the user's physical attack by 5% for 2 seconds.
Attacking enemy units that have HP below 50% will raise hero's physical damage by 25%. Lasts 2 seconds. (Takes affect before damage is dealt)
If no damage was dealt or taken in 5 seconds, next Basic Attack will deal 100% Physical Damage or Physical Attack.
null
null
Gain a Shield equal to 200% Magic Power. Gain another after 30s when it breaks.
Casting a skill or using Basic Attacks will increase Movement Speed by 2%, Physical & Magic Defense by 4. Lasts 4s. Stacks up to 5 times.
In 3s after using the skill, the casters next Basic Attack deals additional True Damage as much as 120% of Magic Power with a cooldown of 1.5s. Then briefly gains 10% Movement Speed
Time: Adds 25 HP and 4 Magic Power every 20s. Up to 12 times
If Time reaches Max, then the hero will receive extra 5% Magic Power and 300 Mana
Killing enemy heroes restore 10% Max HP.
Each time a Basic Attack deals damage to enemies, reduces the target's Movement Speed by 8% (halved for ranged Basic Attacks) for 1.5s. Stacking up to 5 times.
When each Basic Attack deals damage to enemies, increase Attack Speed by 8%. Stacks up to 5 times. Lasts 3s.
Deals 1.5% Magic Damage equal to the Max HP to nearby enemies per second. The damage will increase 50% to Minions.
Basic attacks will deal 9% of the target's current HP as additional physical damage (up to 60 against creeps and minions).
Each Basic Attack grants 3% Physical Lifesteal for 3s. Stack up to 5 times.
Eliminations of enemy heroes and assists regenerates hero's mana by 10%, while eliminating minions regenerates 4% of the hero's mana.
Each point of the enemy's Magic Defense increases Magic Penetration by 0.1% when dealing damage to it, capped at 20%.
Reduces the Shield and HP Regen of nearby enemy heroes by 50% (excluding those affected by 'Life Drain'), and their Attack Speed by 30%.
After using a skill, the next Basic Attack will deal an extra 85% of Physical Attack as True Damage. This effect has a CD of 1.5s.
When Divine Justice's effect is triggered, it will increase the hero's movement speed by 10%.

Skill Damage will burn the targets for 3s, dealing 1% of the target's Max HP as Magic Damage per second (damaging the same target multiple times within a short duration can increase this damage to 2% at most), 10 damage minimum
Unable to increase critical chance. Every 1% of critical chance gained will increase attack speed by 1%.
After every 2 non-critical Basic Attacks. Attack Speed of the next Basic Attack is increased by 100% and its effects is triggered an extra 2 time(s).
When HP drops below 40%, the hero will receive an extra 10% physical lifesteal.
Increase magic attack by 21%-35% (Scales with level)
Attacks enemy heroes or Creeps for 5 times in a row and improves Movement Speed by 30% for 3s. This effect has a CD of 15s.
Skills that deal damage to an enemy hero will slow them by 15%. This effect lasts 3s. Stacks up to 2 times.
Resurrect 2.5s upon death and gets 16% Max HP and 220-1200 shield that lasts for 3s. (Scales with level) This effect has a CD of 210s.
Every 6s, the next skill echoes, dealing 20-1000 Magic Damage (scales with the hero's Max Mana) to up to 3 enemies

Raises shield abosorption and HP regeneration effect by 30%.
Dealing or taking damage slows hero's movement speed by 40 for 5s
Once the hero's HP falls below 30% they generate a shield that absorbs 510~1350 points of damage (increases with level) that lasts for 3 seconds. CD is 40 seconds.
Crit hits increase the hero's attack speed by 30% and Crit Chance by 5%. Lasting 2s.
Increases own Magic Damage Reduction by 3-10 upon taking Magic Damage (scales with level), lasting for 3s and stacking up to 6 times.

Regenerates 1.5%-3.5% of the hero's Max HP per second. (Each kill or assist increases it by 0.25%, including kills and assists prior to purchase.) This effect wears off within 5s after taking damage.
